long_description: Run your errands with the hassle-free Novara 'Round Town Single Bike Pannier-it holds bulky stuff such as groceries, folds up like a grocery bag and attaches easily to your rear rack. Durable coated-nylon pannier holds up to everyday use and folds up compactly. Plastic sheeting stiffens the bottom and back; inner aluminum hinge holds the basket open. Includes easy-carry handles and an internal compression strap to hold items inside pannier. Simple mounting system works on most rear racks; Rixen and Kaul(R) Twist-clip system simplifies attachment and removal. Mounting system is built to accommodate a variety of rack diameters from 8 - 12mm. Novara 'Round Town Pannier basket has a clip loop for LED blinker light, not included. Reflective highlights improve nighttime visibility.
short_description: Run your errands with the hassle-free Novara 'Round Town Single Bike Pannier-it holds bulky stuff such as groceries, folds up like a grocery bag and attaches easily to your rear rack.
